meta-description: Hesperides University is a leading academic institution committed to providing high-quality education that keeps pace with global developments, with a focus on scientific research and sustainable social impact. We believe in the importance of innovation, continuous development, and sustainability in building an outstanding academic future. We are dedicated to preparing leaders and innovators who contribute to the advancement of society.

legal_advice_description: You can request legal advice from a lawyer here. The service is free and your identity is hidden. No registration is required. Ask your legal question and get a free answer from one of the lawyers through the Q&A section, live chat, or by phone. Just choose the method that suits you.
legal_advice_description-lawyers1: You can submit a Request for Quotation (RFQ) through the Legal Advice Middle East website to participating lawyers and receive quotes from them to choose from. You can then accept any offer you receive and hire the lawyer you selected by paying their fee online.
legal_advice_description-lawyers2: You will need to pay a small refundable amount to prove the seriousness of your request before sending your RFQ to the lawyers. You can later use this amount to pay the lawyerâ€™s fee or request a refund if, for any reason, you receive fewer than three quotations from lawyers within the specified period (five working days).

legal_consultation_message: You can consult a lawyer from here. The service is free and your identity is anonymous. No registration is required. Ask your legal question and get a free answer from one of the lawyers through the Q&A section, live chat, or by phone. Just choose the method that suits you.
